reviewText: One of the best Puerto Rican movies I have seen.  Highly recommend to any Boricua and anybode else.  :)

BEING A LATINA I COULD RELATE TO THE INTERTWINED LOVE STORIES IN THIS MOVIE.
IT WAS AN HONEST LOOK AT LATIN CULTURE RE LOVE AT ANY AGE. THE OPENING STORY LINE OF THE COUPLE FIGHTING ABOUT NOTHING IS OH SO TRUE. BEEN THERE DONE THAT!!!
THE STORYLINE OF INFIDELITY MAY HAVE BEEN FUNNY AS HELL, BUT TRUE TO LIFE AS IT CAN BE, WITH WANTING TO KICK SOMEONE'S BUTT DUE TO THE HURT AND BETRAYAL, WAS RIGHT ON!! BEEN THERE DONE THAT AS WELL.
BUT THE OLDER GENERATION'S LOVE STORY WAS THE MOST ENDEARING OF ALL.
I CAME AWAY FROM THIS MOVIE LOVING MY PEOPLE AND CULTURE MORE THAN EVER. I BOUGHT 5 COPIES OF THIS MOVIE TO THOSE I LOVE AND THEY IN TURN HAVE LOVED ME FOR IT.
THE ESSENCE OF THE MOVIE IS UNIVERSAL BUT FOR ME WAS VERY PERSONAL.  IT IS A GREAT MOVIE.

This film is a clear representation of who we are and I loved it.  I recommend this movie to anyone.  I actually purchased it and I cannot wait to see it again and share it with family and friends.  Although I was born and raised in NJ,  I consider myself to be pure Puerto Rican.  I love who I am and where I come from.  My father is a true jibaro and he made sure we knew our culture.  Back to the film.  GREAT MOVIE
This movie was excellent each actor played there part to the T, hilarious, meaningful, and very much true,,  RAted 5 stars

Charleen's review here is right on- too bad, this could have been an excellent movie- they have the story (stories), all the actors are cast right, filmed nicely- I just wish they would have taken more time with this.
This is a great, heartwarming, bittersweet, funny movie of three love stories.  Very entertaining!
This is an excellent movie went to the movies in PR while on Vacation to see this movie it's funny, sad, crazy it has it all...

This is an excellent Puerto Rican film produced by Benicio del Toro. The film is wrongly translated; it should be "Lovesickness". I saw this movie at the theater in Puerto Rico and it was great. It is a comedy filled with heartfelt and endearing moments. It is funny, entertaining and a bit schizophrenic, all in one. All perfectly combined.

The movie tells three separate stories that depict the oddball, slightly psychotic and emotional side of love. A woman deals with the unfaithfulness of her husband (and with who) the day her grandmother dies; and her son starts to experience a teen crush. An old divorced couple meets up again after years when she helps him out by allowing him to live at their home. But, what about her other, newer ex-husband who also lives there? This is a hysterical account about jealousy at all stages in live. A man hijacks a bus because he wants to marry the driver, will she want to? Granted, she doesn't even know who he is.

The stories are both original and typical in that they happen to everyone and yet they are so uniquely experienced. The film is funny and honestly, really good. The only fault I found in this movie is that it is too short and there is not that much character development (it leaves a lot to the imagination). But, it is a really good effort by the Puerto Rican actors. I enjoyed it very much, and laughed quite a bit.

A great movie about the modern Puertorrican character, with all its quirks, humor, and melodrama.  Plus the behind the scenes show how the movie was put together and reveals some cinematography tricks.

It is amazing how this stories show our real life. This movie is very close to daily situations that you can see in any singe day. No makeup, no beautiful phrases, not the classic love stories, not the most beautiful actress or handsome actors. It is about real life, with real daily living and real people with different kind of point of view about what life is about. Very interesting!!!!!

this movie is  so good, if you are puertorican this will bring back so many memories of

It is so funny! It makes you laugh, the actors are very good. I loved the story, it shows a funny side of latinos.

I LOVED THIS MOVIE!!!  This movie has captured real life situations in many puertorrican families. It brought back so many memories from the island and our people.

It's a true shame that Mr Miguel A. Alvarez & Chavito Marrero are no longer with us! They brought to life two great characters.

On a brighter note... GREAT ACTING!! would watch it over and over again!

Love sick huh? Well im going to bias and tell you that only hispanics can relate in most areas of this film. You will laugh, maybe jerk a tear. This film was recomended to me i bought it and im not dissapointed. I will say however puerto rican people really tend to be like this. Not to be confused or misunderstood, generally they are good, humble, hard working, happy people. But when it comes down to over reacting in certain situations they are exageratedly funny. You'll have a good time watching this even with your inlaws.

This movie is awesome; if you are from Puerto Rico you know what I'm talking about.  The movie is amazing, and this seller was very professional sending the movie sooner than I thought and just in perfect conditions, N E W!
